name: Nelx Prototype 1.3
description:
Nelx Is a physics sandbox with multiple Stuff to play with currently the game is in its prototype phase Which means no clear story or objective You can play the game and post the bugs and the Suggestion that you have to make the game better 

  • W.A.S.D Movement
  • Tab to open the menu and select objects
  • E to Spawn the selected object
  • Right mouse Click to Carry the object
  • Ctrl + R to reset The World;

In the future, the game will have a story mode and procedural worlds, and more objects with a simple world editor
